pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, September 7, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, September 7, 2017:

Kelowna, British Columbia

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting

Closed to media

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Skeena-Pennask-Schuswap Room
Delta Hotels Grand Okanagan Resort

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:30 p.m.

Media appearance

  • An interview with Prime Minister on CKFR Early Edition on AM1150 will air live at 7:00 a.m.

Note: all times local
